sentences.english: Conclusion Moxibustion therapy is an effective method for acute gouty arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 結論中醫灸法治療痛風性關節炎急性期療效確切。

sentences.english: However, vitamin C hasn’t been studied as a treatment for gout.
sentences.chinese: 然而，沒有研究表明維生素C是治療痛風的一種方法。

sentences.english: Carpal tunnel syndrome secondary to gout is uncommon.
sentences.chinese: 腕管綜合徵繼發性痛風是少見。

sentences.english: Gout is caused by abnormal metabolism of purine.
sentences.chinese: 痛風是由於嘌呤代謝異常引起的疾病。

sentences.english: To study the value of arthroscopy in diagnosing and treating pyrophosphate arthropathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討膝關節鏡在診治假性痛風病中的應用價值。

sentences.english: During an attack, gout is typically treated with drugs that cool inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 在痛風發作期，典型治療是用減緩炎症的藥物。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the characters of Gouty Arthritis happened in extreme cold areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討芪龍風溼丸治療痛風性關節炎的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Now Ilaris also seems to work for gout.
My toe is pricking with the gout.
sentences.chinese: 我因患痛風而感到腳趾像刺扎的一樣痛。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effectiveness of surgical operation treatment for severe chronic gouty arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價手術治療慢性嚴重痛風性關節炎的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: ObjectiveSet up the method to detect the content of Arecoline hydrobromide in Tongfeng oral liquid.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立痛風口服液中檳榔鹼的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The anti-hemorrhoidal ointment Preparation H can reduce gout-induced skin swelling temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 一種治療痔的藥膏處方能夠暫時減輕痛風的疼痛。

sentences.english: Sometimes, psoriatic arthritis is incorrectly diagnosed as gout or can even be associated with gout.
sentences.chinese: 有時，銀屑病關節炎被誤診爲痛風或甚至與痛風有關。

sentences.english: Sometimes, psoriatic arthritis is incorrectly diagnosed as gout or can even be associated with gout.
sentences.chinese: 有時，銀屑病關節炎被誤診爲痛風或甚至與痛風有關。

sentences.english: Should prednisolone be first-line therapy for acute gout?
sentences.chinese: 潑尼松龍能否作爲痛風急性發作期的一線治療藥物？

sentences.english: He has been confined two months by gout.
sentences.chinese: 他因痛風病已臥牀兩個月了。

pinyin: zi4 ti3 mian3 yi4 ji2 bing4

definition: (TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
